au.edu.rmit.agtgrp.apparate.gui.simviewer.controller

Class MapUpdater

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.edu.rmit.agtgrp.apparate.gui.simviewer.controller.MapUpdater
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGridEnvironUpdateListener, ITimerListener

    public class MapUpdater
extends Object
implements IGridEnvironUpdateListener, ITimerListener
    Listens to any events occurred within grid environment and would trigger a redraw of the map
    Author:
    Andy Xie
